DOC.brief_title: A Study Test Effectiveness Safety MK0893 Combination With Other Drugs Used Treat Type 2 Diabetes ( 0893-015 )
DOC.criteria: Participants Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus , suboptimal glucose control , either AHA ( antihyperglycemic agent ) therapy monotherapy lowdose combination therapy Participants history Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus Participants take insulin thiazolidinediones ( TZDs : peroxisome proliferatoractivated receptor [ PPAR ] gamma agonist ) Participants contraindication metformin sitagliptin
